name: Eisenhower Matrix
description: An Eisenhower matrix background and the ability to add task notes. The task notes will be draggable so that they can be positioned in the correct quadrant easily.
objectives: Learn how to create drag and drop elements
Learn how to sign in with Google

table_schema:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS notes
CREATE TABLE notes
       (
         note_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
         note_body VARCHAR(255),
         position_x INTEGER DEFAULT 465,
         position_y INTEGER DEFAULT 540
       )

name: pastebin
description: A full-stack code paste bin that retains formatting of pasted code.

name: sun tracker
description: Front-end app that gives the user the sunrise and sunset times for their location.
objectives: Use fetch to query multiple APIs

name: study resources sharer
description: Browse study resources, log in and add them to your study list.
objectives: Login with Firebase, to show a user their study list

name: what's on page
description: Browse what's on at the arena from a list fetched from an API.
objectives: Use CSS variables and media queries to build light and dark modes
